page.title: 15 Kerbie and Double Ball
page.content: Kerbie is played after school. Kerbie is a very good{game}.A mixed team of two people can play.Any ball will do but a football is best.You stand on the kerb and throw the ball at the kerb opposite. If the ball bounces back off the kerb you score one point.If you catch the ball with two hands you score two points. If you catch it with one hand you score five points.The person who scores the most points out of three games wins. Double ball can be played in the school yard or in the{street}.You can throw the balls in the air or at the wall.It's a{game}for girls.You must be fast for double ball because you have to keep throwing the balls up against the wall,and catching them every time.One of the movements is{LEGGY.} Leggy means you throw the balls under your leg.
